item.title: Tweet
item.description: Han (to himself) : I wonder if just throwing more Bothans at the job might bring that information back sooner? #HanSoloManagementStyle ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Luke : Make the jump to hyperspace Han : You can’t without the correct risk assessment. It ain’t like dusting crops. #HanSoloManagementStyle ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Luke : but a lightsaber… Han : I prefer a blaster, tried & tested. None of your Lean / Agile techniques for me! #HanSoloManagementStyle ‚ù§Ô∏è 0 | üîÉ 0
